name: IOGEAR GWU627W6 802.11a/b/g/n USB Type-A Wi-Fi Adapter
Security: WEP, TKIP, AES, WPA and WPS2, WPS
Features: [Management: Windows-based Utility, Add high-speed 802.11n Internet access to any Ethernet enabled device such as a Blu-ray player, DVR, HDTV, game console or media PC., Push-button Wi-Fi Protected Setup (WPS) simplifies secure and easy wireless configuration., Convenient LED status indicators., Plug and Play - No special drivers required., Compact and stylish design.]
